main event: An observer thought he saw a glowing object in the shape of a four-leaf clover at 30,000 feet, making ninety-degree turns, and then heading straight up.
interesting points: The object was observed at a high altitude of 30,000 feet., The observer described the object as having the shape of a four-leaf clover., The object was making rapid ninety-degree turns., The last sighting of the object showed it heading straight up into the sky., There is a possibility that the object could have been a searchlight or other known phenomena.
sighted object: a glowing object in the form of a four-leaf clover
